reset.description: Wipe all settings and start with defaults. This can't be undone

get.description: Get the current value of a server setting.

remove.description: Remove a server setting or an item from a list-type setting.

reset.already: You are already using default settings.

set.requires_plan: This setting requires {requirement}. Use `/accelerated subscribe` to upgrade.
set.missing_boolean: **`{name}` expects a boolean. Use the `value` option.**
set.missing_integer: **`{name}` expects an integer. Use the `value` option.**
set.missing_channel: **`{name}` expects a channel. Use the `channel` option.**
set.missing_role: **`{name}` expects a role. Use the `role` option.**
set.missing_channel_add: **`{name}` expects a channel to add. Use the `channel` option.**
set.missing_role_add: **`{name}` expects a role to add. Use the `role` option.**
set.unknown_type: Setting parsed as value as type isn't known

get.private: For privacy reasons, this setting is hidden.

remove.channel_required: You must specify a channel to remove.
remove.role_required: You must specify a role to remove.
